categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order personnel

nodes.text: Elma was a male technician in charge of maintaining the droids at the Q'Maere Research Facility. Formerly a member of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order, his loyalty came under suspicion and he was sent to the Re-Education branch to be "re-brained". He was part of the staff left behind when Moff Kentor Sarne abandoned the facility. Elma was shy and meek, and would cower at trouble.
